SELECT s.`name`, s.`brand`, s.`year`, s.`season`, b.`month`, b.`sex`, b.band_code, b.devt_type, b.channel, sd.`status` as sd_status, sd.confirm_status as sd_confirm_status, c.* FROM t_planning_season s, t_planning_band b, t_planning_category_item c left JOIN t_sample_design sd on (sd.planning_category_item_id = c.id and sd.del_flag='0') WHERE s.id = c.planning_season_id AND b.id = c.planning_band_id AND c.del_flag = '0'
